blogData.title: A Nature Of Art Bangu Yilbara Collection: English To Hindi Video Transcription   And Translation
blogData.description:
This post is about Bangu Yilbara collection at Museum of Contemporary
  Art Australia (MCA) in Sydney. We describe how to transcribe the video in English,
  and then translate the video into Hindi, with the help of AI.
blogData.keywords: ai transcription, ai translation, ai translator, ai localization, how to translate English to Hindi, English to Hindi translator, English to Hindi converter, English to Hindi translation online, English transcription meaning in Hindi, illustrated guide English to Hindi translation, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions
blogData.coverAlt: A Nature Of Art Bangu Yilbara Collection: English To Hindi Video Transcription   And Translation

data.richContent:
We got this video from Museum of Contemporary Art Australia’s Youtube page This video is about Bangu Yilbara collection at the MCA. The collection is focused on art produced by the Aboriginal and Torres Straits Islander cultures.

The exhibition focuses on the diversity of Aboriginal and Torres Straits Islander culture, primarily by looking to the artists to define their work, as opposed to labelling the work ‘Aboriginal’ and boxing it into any particular style.

Below, we have the final video, after transcription into English, and translation into Hindi.

Steps

  1. Please open your browser and go to videotranslator.ai, and then click on the Login button. On successfully log-In into the application, select myTemplate, and create a new item mca.
  2. Upload the video and adjust it’s display size you want to display.
  3. Once you are done. Trigger the transcribe action. Select the language preferred for the video. People in this video has Australian accent, so we select language as English (Australia).
  4. Once transcription is complete, we quickly check it with human effort. And move forward to other step to Trigger Translate action to translate captions from English to Hindi. Please watch the video below
  5. Once the Translate action is performed and complete, a pop up box appear with file name you want for that Hindi translation file. Input file name and click on Submit button to save the Translation.
  6. On successful completion of translation process open translated file and human check the Translation captions, to fix the sentences. Once this is done, we move to final step ‘Auto-Overlay’ for the captions to Overlay on video.

  7. That’s all. Thank you for reading this process and check out the final Auto-Overlay video here.

Conclusion

In this post, we have Transcribe and Translated English video content for Hindi Caption of ‘Museum of Contemporary Art Australia’.
As the video now has Hindi captions, This Hindi Captions video will help to promote Museum Contemporary Art (MCA) and let people know more about Bangu Yilbara works.

Video Translator makes no representation of a relationship with Museum of Contemporary Art Australia (MCA). We are using publicly available content to showcase an interesting use case of our platform.

If you are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform, or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

nodes.title: Khmer: A Cultural Bridge to Cambodia
nodes.description: Khmer is a vital part of Cambodia’s cultural identity. As the official language of Cambodia, Khmer plays a key role in connecting the nation to its rich heritage and history. The uniqueness of Khmer adds to the richness of Southeast Asian culture. In the following blog post, we’ll unravel the distinctiveness of Khmer, the main cultural bridge to Cambodia.
nodes.coverAlt: Khmer: A Cultural Bridge to Cambodia

nodes.title: Unraveling the Unique, Inclusive Language of Indonesia
nodes.description: Bahasa Indonesia, the official language of Indonesia, holds a special place in the hearts of its people. Its evolution and distinctive features make it a language that stands out in the world of linguistics. In this blog post, we'll embark on a journey to explore what makes Bahasa Indonesia so unique.
nodes.coverAlt: Unraveling the Unique, Inclusive Language of Indonesia
